top_message: To a world where everyone can express themselves
sec1_content:
Marginal competitions are always free to use. 
Marginal competitions are run with donations and pocket money, so you will never be charged a fee.
sec2_content:
All you need to participate is a Discord account and Twitter to post your work!
No qualifications, age restrictions, or troublesome screening!
can_title: What you can do at the Project Genkai
